english.list_description: Show the list of words for given word group or leave empty to explore all word groups.
english.quiz_description: Trigger a new quiz question. The quiz must be running for this command.
english.language_description: Change the language in which bot speaks.
english.start_description: Start the repeating quiz. Example: /start english_b2 120m.
english.add_word_description: Bot admins only: [{"word": "your word", "language": "your language", "quiz_type": "<translate> by default", "descriptions": {"english": "the translation or context"}}, ...]
english.remove_word_description: Bot admins only: remove word by it's name from all the word groups
english.change_description_description: Bot admins only: {"language": "your language", "descriptions": {"english": "word group description"}}
